HIGH.description: Significant risk - branch recommended before implementation
HIGH.threshold: Any HIGH signal OR 3+ MODERATE signals

MODERATE.threshold: Any MODERATE signal without HIGH signals

HIGH.name: Core utility modification
HIGH.condition: Modifies shared/core utilities used across codebase

HIGH.name: Database schema changes
HIGH.condition: Requires database migrations or schema modifications

HIGH.name: Breaking API changes
HIGH.condition: Modifies public APIs in non-backwards-compatible ways

HIGH.name: Security-related modifications
HIGH.condition: Touches authentication, authorization, or sensitive data handling

MODERATE.name: New feature touching existing code
MODERATE.condition: New feature that integrates with existing functionality

MODERATE.name: Significant test updates
MODERATE.condition: Requires updating multiple existing test files

MODERATE.name: Configuration changes
MODERATE.condition: Modifies environment variables, config files, or feature flags

MODERATE.name: Performance-sensitive area
MODERATE.condition: Touches code paths with strict performance requirements
